sentences.sContent: Freedom of speech is every American’s birthright.
sentences.sCn: 言论自由是每一个美国人与生俱来的权利。

synos.tran: 与生俱来的权利；长子继承权

remMethod.val: birth (出生) + right (权利) → 与生俱来的权利

trans.tranCn: 与生俱来的权利；长子继承权
trans.tranOther: something such as a right, property, money etc that you believe you should have because of the family or country you belong to
